name: Bloom (itch) (beeptotheboop, ShinkenReuf, calderaa, DivineComedie, Robb_Fr)
description:
Help Iro overcome their bullies and bloom.

Bloom is inspired by the story of David & Goliath and the theme of plants. Iro, the bloom hero, tries to get away from their bullies and grow. Meeting a dog or finding friends results in a little plant growing on its head. They then also help the bullies grow. A story of bloom.

Player controls 🌱:


W/⬆️ (up)

A/⬅️(left)S/⬇️ (down)
D/➡️ (right)

Dog controls 🐶:


I (up)

J (left)
K (down)
L (right)

Tips:

To get stronger, start playing with your new friend🌱! In Hide & Seek, don't forget to take advantage of the speed of your partner 🐶. Place your character where you can see a lot of door, and control the dog to win! Go and fight the bullies afterward 🏹.

⚠️ The dog should be faster than your character! If they're not, relaunch the game (the bug is known and should not happen after a restart).

Dev: Tom Demont, Harold Benoit, Kevin Faustini

Music: Manon Michel
